column4: A mass of enormous corrupted crystals has been detected near the Scream Puff. Pilot a vacuum suit, destroy the crystals, and gather the remnants for processing and repurposing.
column6: Destroy small corrupted crystals and submit the remnants to the field scanners.
column7:
The mech op directive “Destroy Corrupted Crystals” has been issued.
Pilot candidates, please apply for deployment via your exotablets.
column8: Mechs will be deployed shortly. Supporting personnel, please report to the directive's designated location.

column4: A bed of toxic spongoi has sprouted near the Mush-room. Needless to say, the proliferation of these spongoi and their spores would greatly impede the exploration initiative. Pilot a warp loader and clear out the red spongoi.
column6: Clear away smaller spongoi using flamethrowers, and submit their ashes to nearby field scanners.
column7:
The mech op directive “Clear Toxic Lunar Spongoi” has been issued.
Pilot candidates, please apply for deployment via your exotablets.
column8: Mechs will be deployed shortly. Supporting personnel, please report to the directive's designated location.

column4: The Saltpeter Shore is rich in phainite, a resource highly valued by the initiative. Pilot a vacuum suit, harness the necessary energy, and extract this volcanic glass from pits of quicksand.
column5:
Mine phainite from quicksand pits.
Ten units of ionic energy must be harnessed for extraction.
column6: Drill for shallow reserves of phainite, and submit samples to nearby field scanners.
column7:
The mech op directive “Mine Phainite” has been issued.
Pilot candidates, please apply for deployment via your exotablets.
column8: Mechs will be deployed shortly. Supporting personnel, please report to the directive's designated location.

column4: Fluctuations in the Chillmark's ground temperature have enabled the proliferation of remarkably high-purity glass clusters─a vital asset for crafting lenses and machinery. Pilot the warp loader, shatter the clusters, and collect the larger fragments that remain.
column6: Salvage glass fragments, and submit them to nearby field scanners.
column7:
The mech op directive “Shatter Glass Clusters” has been issued.
Pilot candidates, please apply for deployment via your exotablets.
column8: Mechs will be deployed shortly. Supporting personnel, please report to the directive's designated location.
